Locale.Value: Dear users, we sincerely invite you to explore a more powerful PDFelement V10. If you are a perpetual member, you can go back to the old version at any time if you don't like the newest version. Optimize the user experience of Translate PDF, and generate new PDF with translated results in one click Optimize the user experience of AI floating window, and support to pin on the screen Support shortcut keys for common comment features Support to open the last session PDFs in one click Corrections and improvements in many small details Fix the crash issue that might occur in certain situations
